name: Space Exploration Beta 4.9
description:
Its a game about going into space to explore and evacuate humans to another planet similar to Earth, filled with Dark Humor and Violence. My inspiration is from games like Postal 2 and Fallout 3. This game wont be like another since I'm thinking about a future game mechanic that will be pretty unique.  Made with Copper cube 6 

https://justkiddinggames.itch.io/spaceexploration9  Newer Version Released
